name: 王宇诗
introduction: Yushi Wang was born in P.R China. First attending the Guangdong University of Technology, he then transferred to the Florida A&M University in Tallahassee, FL in 2005. Yushi earned a B.S. in Environmental Science in summer 2007. After graduation, he began his graduate studies at IIHR-Hydroscience and Engineering at the University of Iowa. He was working on CFD and hydrodynamics. After receiving his M.S. degree in 2010, Yushi was continuing his work at IIHR towards a Ph.D. focus on open source CFD solver development and application.
